overview:
im Campigli has over twenty years of software industry experience at both early-stage and public companies.

In his previous role as a founder and CTO of Librados, Jim was responsible for overall product strategy and product messaging, and served as an evangelist for Librados’ standards based approach to enterprise application integration. Jim was a member of the management team that led the company’s acquisition by Netmanage, Inc. Following the successful acquisition, Jim joined Netmanage as CTO for the Librados products group.

Prior to Librados, Jim was the VP of Product Management for Insevo, Inc., a middleware company specializing in enterprise application integration. After becoming a recognized leader in the middleware space the company was acquired. Jim also held senior product management and consulting management positions at BEA Systems and SAP. Jim holds a B.A. from the University of California, Berkeley.
